#summary Lua-GDBM storage
#labels Stage-Beta,Type-Storage,ArchiveStorage

= Introduction =

This is a storage module using GNU DBM as backend.
It supports archives.

= Dependencies =

[http://webserver2.tecgraf.puc-rio.br/~lhf/ftp/lua/#lgdbm lgdbm] is required to access gdbm databases.

= Details =

Refer to [https://prosody.im/doc/storage Prosodys data storage documentation].

= Compatibility =

|| >=0.9 || Should work ||
